title: Minion icons outdated
body:
Dear Riot,

hang on give me 50 minutes just started a game

ok in loading screen atm

So basically I was thinking to myself while waiting in que 'who actually respects their minions'. Because, if you think about it minions are the best team mates here's why:
- Their always pushing.
- They never complain what colour they are.
- They always take turret agro.(till someone attacks under turret)
- they actually allow a summoner to push.

So I make 1 request to Riot please update the minion Summoner icons, it would show them even more respect.

P.S. it was a 21:33 minute game which we won because, we respected our minions.

replies.body: If you want to show you your minions some more love, don't forget the Banner of Command! {{item:3060}}
And if you really want to spoil them grab Baron buff and knock down a bunch of inhibitors.
I very much so love this post{{champion:45}}
